short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that hides the 'Explore' and 'Reels' buttons on the Instagram webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install this extension if the Explore and/or Reels pages are wasting your time. 

Changelog:

v0.1.2
- Extension was no longer hiding the 'Explore' page, changed the regex so that all <a> tags with an 'href' that contains '/explore/' are hidden.

v0.1.1
- Fixed a  bug where pages were not hidden on non-English versions of instagram.com.

v0.1.0
- Initial release.
